itemData.description: The sturdy metal construction of this bow offers superior durability, while its lack of firing quirks makes it quite reliable. Once favored by the knights at Hyrule Castle.
itemData.name: knight's bow

itemData.description: A magical sword forged in the frigid mountains of the Hebra region. When the blade glows blue, enemies struck by it will become frozen.
itemData.name: frostblade

itemData.description: The abilities of this Guardian sword have been boosted to the maximum., as evidenced by its increase in size. It slices through armor like a hot knife through butter!
itemData.name: guardian sword++

itemData.description: This shield features a traditional design from Necluda. Its combat capabilities aren't much better than the standard wooden shield, but it found popularity for its design.
itemData.name: emblazoned shield
